thread.title: Andy Carroll and Diafra Sakho fly to Dubai with West Ham to help injury recoveries
thread.title_full: Andy Carroll and Diafra Sakho fly to Dubai with West Ham to help injury recoveries

author: jgordon
title: Andy Carroll and Diafra Sakho fly to Dubai with West Ham to help injury recoveries
text:
comeback trail Andy Carroll and Diafra Sakho fly to Dubai with West Ham to help injury recoveries 
The strike duo are battling to return as Slaven Bilic's side aim to continue their run of good form Exclusive Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ANDY CARROLL and Diafra Sakho have flown to Dubai with the West Ham squad to step up their recoveries from injury. 3 Andy Carroll has been in brilliant form after missing the first few months of the season with injury 
But he has travelled with the Hammers to the UAE with a team of medical staff were step up his rehabilitation. 
Keep up to date with ALL the West Ham news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Carroll has a minor groin injury , and is expected to be ready for West Ham’s next match away at Watford as he resumes first-team training. 
A West Ham source revealed: “Andy and Diafra were both on the plane. They are rapidly recovering and are hopeful of a big end to the season. 
“They have both had their injury problems, but hopefully that is all behind them now and they can kick-on.” Related Stories Team news West Ham vs West Brom: Andy Carroll out with groin strain while Sam Byram makes bench after hamstring injury KARREN BRADY Andy Carroll's leaner and fitter than ever and inspiring West Ham back to form KING CARROLL Andy Carroll's wonder strike for West Ham against Crystal Palace named goal of the month for January SAK'D OFF Diafra Sakho out for eight weeks with back injury as West Ham's striker woes continue Sidelined again West Ham confirm striker Diafra Sakho will out of action until the New Year with another injury setback 
Ex-Metz star Sakho has been lightly running for a few weeks and was not set to return until mid-March. 
West Ham are thought to be spending a few days in Dubai while the FA Cup weekend is carried out. 
They were knocked out of the competition in the last round after being hammered 5-0 at home by Manchester City. Reuters Diafra Sakho was not due back until mid-March but is stepping up his recovery West Ham striker Andy Carroll scores an outrageous overhead kick against Palace 3 In-form Carroll suffered yet another setback after a frustrating season 
Carroll had scored four goals in as many matches before his latest setback after playing just 16 times this season. 
Aaron Creswell has also gone to Dubai despite being hauled off a half-time against West Brom on Saturday with a dead leg. West Ham 2-2 West Brom : Jonny Evans heads home last gasp equaliser
